topic.title: Build WorkBook from Map
topic.shortdesc: Generates a FrameMaker book that contains all of the XML files referenced by a DITA map.

body.p: A “WorkBook” is a FrameMaker book that contains all of the XML files referenced by a DITA map and any sub-maps. This book is used for book-wide processing using FrameMaker’s built-in commands; it is not intended to be used for publishing or output generation. Use the Open All XML Files in Book command to open the XML files before using a book-wide processing command.
